replaceAll.name: Replace Default Status Effects
replaceAll.hint: Replace all of Foundry's default status effects with Dragonbane-themed effects. Dragonbane and YZE Combat add their own effects separately. Requires reload.

showSpellEffects.name: Show Spell Effects
showSpellEffects.hint: Include spell-related status effects in the list of available effects. Requires reload.

showHeroicAbilities.name: Show Heroic Abilities
showHeroicAbilities.hint: Include heroic ability status effects in the list of available effects. Requires reload.

enableTokenHudStyling.name: Enhanced Token HUD Layout
enableTokenHudStyling.hint: Enable 6-column grid layout with section headers for token HUD status effects. Disable if you prefer Foundry's default layout or want to use custom CSS.

customStatusEffects.name: Custom Status Effects (JSON)
customStatusEffects.hint: Define custom status effects as a JSON array. Example: [{'id':'my-effect','name':'My Effect','img':'icons/svg/example.svg','category':'general'}]. Valid categories: general, spell, ability

descriptionEditor.name: Edit Status Effect Descriptions
descriptionEditor.hint: Open the description editor to add custom descriptions to status effects. Useful for modules like Visual Active Effects.
descriptionEditor.label: Open Description Editor

settings.reloadRequired: Setting changed. Reload the world for changes to take effect.

editor.title: Status Effect Description Editor
editor.instructions: Add custom descriptions to your status effects. These descriptions will be used by Visual Active Effects and other modules that display status effect information. You can drag items, actors, or journal entries from Foundry directly into the description fields to create clickable links. Note: After saving, existing effects on tokens must be removed and reapplied to show the new descriptions.
editor.placeholder: Enter a description for this status effect... You can also drag items, spells, or journal entries here to create links.

import.title: Import Status Effect Descriptions
import.warning: This will replace all current descriptions with the imported ones.
import.confirm: Are you sure you want to continue?

clearAll.title: Clear All Descriptions
clearAll.content: Are you sure you want to clear all status effect descriptions? This action cannot be undone.

notifications.exportFailed: Failed to export descriptions. Please try again.
notifications.importError: Failed to import descriptions. Please try again.
notifications.linkFailed: Failed to create link from dropped item

errors.invalidFile: Invalid file format: missing or invalid descriptions object

errors.notArray: Custom Status Effects: Must be an array of effects
errors.invalidFormat: Custom Status Effects: Invalid format - must be an array of effects
errors.invalidJSON: Custom Status Effects: Invalid JSON format

warnings.systemCompatibility: Dragonbane Status Effects module is designed for the Dragonbane system. Some status effects may not work as expected.

notifications.customEffectsCleared: Custom effects cleared. Reload the world to apply changes.
